explains: n. 苏格兰人；苏格兰方言

sentences.en: His accent proclaimed him a Scot.
sentences.cn: 他的口音表明他是苏格兰人。

sentences.en: The illusionist has come to the remote town, at the invitation of an enthusiastic admirer who was a Scot with a flirtatious kilt.
sentences.cn: 魔术师应一位热情的崇拜者的邀请来到这个偏远的小镇，崇拜者是个苏格兰人，穿着卖弄风情的女式格呢褶裙。

sentences.en: His accent proclaimed him to be a Scot.
sentences.cn: 他的口音表明他是苏格兰人。
